snippet: The company was also buoyed by an unusually successful promotion on Living Social and close attention to costs.
abstract: Starbucks posts healthy gains in fiscal fourth-quarter profit and revenue, buoyed by unusually successful promotion on Living Social, strong growth in China and close attention to costs; company posts net income of $359 million, or 46 cents a share, compared with $358.5 million, or 47 cents a share, in period year earlier, when it recorded gain related to a real estate sale; excluding that gain, profit rose 24 percent; revenue rose 11 percent, to $3.36 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company was also buoyed by an unusually successful promotion on Living Social and close attention to costs.

headline.seo: Starbucks Posts Gains on Growth in China
headline.main: Starbucks Posts Gains on Growth in China
headline.print_headline: Starbucks Posts Gains On Growth In China
